alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 6:09PM EDT until May 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 508 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Point Baker, or 6 miles north of Milton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milton, Bagdad, Point Baker and Roeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
